00061   int map( int initPopulation, vector<int> size, vector<int> index ) {
00062     // compute the total # places
00063     int placeTotal = 1;
00064     for ( int x = 0; x < int( size.size( ) ); x++ ) 
00065       placeTotal *= size[x];
00066 
00067     // compute the global linear index
00068     int linearIndex = 0;
00069     for ( int i = 0; i < int( index.size( ) ); i++ ) {
00070       if ( index[i] >= 0 && size[i] > 0 && index[i] < size[i] ) {
00071     linearIndex = linearIndex * size[i];
00072     linearIndex += index[i];
00073       }
00074     }
00075 
00076     // compute #agents per place a.k.a. colonists
00077     int colonists = initPopulation / placeTotal;
00078     int remainders = initPopulation % placeTotal;
00079     if ( linearIndex < remainders ) colonists++; // add a remainder
00080     
00081     return colonists;
00082   };
00083   
00088   void kill( ) { alive = false; };

00095     int id = agentId;
00096     return id;
00097   }
